billEvents.eventText: referred to consumer affairs and protection

title: Requires certain disclosures by sperm and ovum storage facilities
summary: Requires sperm and ovum storage facilities to inform clients regarding any state or federal laws relating to the inheritance rights of a posthumously conceived child from the utilization of such sperm or ovum.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to requiring certain disclosures by sperm and ovum storage facilities
